kw.name: Authorize To Openai
kw.doc: Keyword for authorize to OpenAI with your API key obtained from your account.

kw.name: Completion Create
kw.arg: Write robotframework script to test GET request of https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts using libraries RequestsLibrary and JSONLibrary
kw.doc: Keyword for creating text completions in OpenAI and Azure OpenAI. Keyword returns a text string.
kw.msg:
${completion} = *** Settings *** Library RequestsLibrary Library JSONLibrary
*** Variables *** ${url} https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts
*** Test Cases *** Test GET Request ...

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg:
*** Settings *** Library RequestsLibrary Library JSONLibrary
*** Variables *** ${url} https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts
*** Test Cases *** Test GET Request Create Session test_session ${url} ${resp}= Get Request test_session Should Be Equal As Strings ${resp.status_code} 200 ${json}= To Json ${resp.text} Should Be Equal As Strings ${json[0]['title']} sunt aut facere repellat provident occaecati excepturi optio reprehenderit Delete All Sessions
